pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: 体の小さい人ほど放射線の悪影響を受けやすいということです。
lessons.english: The smaller the body, the more likely the person will suffer from the ill effects of radiation.

lessons.japanese: その幼児は放射線にさらされていた。
lessons.english: The infant has been exposed to radioactive rays.

lessons.japanese: 放射線を大量に浴びたら、すぐに嘔吐と下痢が始まります。
lessons.english: After being exposed to a large amount of radiation, vomiting and diarrhea will start quickly.

lessons.japanese: 放射能が原子力発電所から漏れた。
lessons.english: The radioactivity leaked out of the nuclear power plant.

lessons.japanese: 実は、その住民たちは放射線にずっとさらされてきた。
lessons.english: In fact, the inhabitants have been exposed to radioactive rays.

lessons.japanese: 今回の雨には放射能はない。
lessons.english: The rain is radiologically inactive this time.
